content.prompt: The French and British policy of appeasing Mussolini and Hitler can be partly explained by

choices.label: France and Britain’s eagerness to cooperate with the Soviet Union
France and Britain’s confidence in the League of Nations
France and Britain’s desire to maintain foreign policies independent of the United States
the belief that the terms of the Versailles treaty were unjust
a general loss of faith in the effectiveness of diplomacy

topic.text: 8.11: Continuity and Changes in an Age of Global Conflict
